page.title: 13Tourism, Ponderosa Camp
page.content: The Ponderosa H.P. has 101 chalets & 582 caravans. It covers an area of 48 acres. The park has a swimming pool, tennis courts, a play area, a boutique & a club. It has a supermarket for self-catering food plus restaurant. Bicycles & C5s are for hire. Amusements, fish & chip shop, bar, disco, telephones and a launderette are also in the park. On questioning some members of staff we found that there was roughly 15 office staff & 48 cleaning & entertainment staff. A bigger swimming pool is planned & the chalets are soon to be modernised. It seems that most holidaymakers come from Scotland, London or the Midlands.
